front.title: Architectural Commentary on Site Multi-homing using Level 3 Shim

abstract.t: This document provides a commentary of the Level 3 Shim approach to site Multi-homing (L3Shim) as described in [ID.L3SHIM], [ID.REFER], [ID.FUNC], and [ID.HBA], using as a framework for this analysis the approach described in [ID.ARCH].
